3.caption_en:
A circular "Platform Architecture" diagram showing four concentric layers labeled Ecosystem, Engagement, Intelligence, and Infrastructure, with stakeholders placed in the four corners (Consumers, Producers, Partners, Owners) and four colored semicircular segments around the central hub.
